recipesJson.name: Soft Chocolate Cookies
recipesJson.author: codysnider
recipesJson.description: Like warm chocolate chip cookies fresh out of the oven.

reviews.text: Damnnn this is spot on. It seems like that FA Nut Mix/TFA Kentucky Bourbon really defines this one, nut mix giving that weird entenmann's greasy off note which imo really helps the authenticity here, and kentucky bourbon making the chocolate taste more like chocolate chips instead of just a chocolate topping. This is some delicious stuff, thanks for this!
